message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I think it would be a valuable addition to your inventory, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Would you consider $13,000? I'm willing to compromise to make this work.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I am still unable to meet the price of $13,000. Could we possibly agree on $12,000? This would allow us to both benefit from this transaction within our respective constraints.
